Helpful Tips In Choosing A Florida Home Insurance Company

http://onlywire.com/r/55175087

Article by Ricky Jackson at 2011-11-02 12:41:17
Categorized in Home Insurance,

Many top home insurance companies in Florida stopped doing business there right after Hurricane Andrew devastated the state in 1992. That number even grew after the state was again hit by a series of hurricanes in 2004 and 2005 and more companies stopped operations and eventually left the state. Right now, only a fraction of the major home insurance firms still remain in Florida to service their existing clients. In the previous years, around 500 companies are operating in the state, but right now that has fallen down to just 40. Startup firms comprise most of these firms and majority of consumers do not even recognize them.
